name: The Amazing Spider (Jed974)
description:
The spider that bit -man and is actually the hero of the story !

Controls :
Swing : Left-Right / Left joystick
Aim : Mouse / Right joystick
Shoot web : Hold left click/ Hold Left Trigger (LT)
Grab NPC : Hold right click / Hold right Trigger (LT)
Bite : space bar/ South Gamepad Button (A)
